name: nowjs-core
description: NowCanDo Javascript Core [nowjs-core] is a  library written by TypeScript code maintains under Apache 2.0 licence

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build:release
scripts.release:major: npm run lint && changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run lint && changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: npm run lint && changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.docs:update: typedoc --out ./docs/documentation/ ./src/  && git commit -a -m 'update: The documentation updated.'

author: Saeed Tabrizi at NowCanDo.Com
